title: Squid Game: Testing the Limits of your Anxiety
itunes:title: Squid Game: Testing the Limits of your Anxiety
itunes:subtitle: The Netflix hit that's anything BUT child's play
description:
Join us as we get knee deep in dissecting this week's messed up murder game. Through the macabre nature of Netflix's new hit series Squid Game, we explore themes of inequality (across race, gender, income and more), the demonization of the West, and run through some of the interesting fan theories out there, all while trying to stave off a panic attack.


It's not all anxiety inducing - Madi loses her shit over sideburns and Aleena tells us all about her jungle.


Don't forget to follow us and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
